text: thumb|right|200px|Hardiman in February 2009 Adrian Hardiman (21 May 1951 - 7 March 2016) was an Irish judge. He was the justice of the Supreme Court of Ireland. He served from 7 February 2000 until his death on 7 March 2016. Hardiman was born in Dublin, Ireland. He studied at Belvedere College, at University College Dublin, and at the King's Inn. Hardiman died in Dublin, Ireland from a heart attack. He was aged 65. ==References== ==Other websites== *Irish Courts Service *University College Dublin *The Honorable Society of the Kings Inns *The Literary and Historical Society (L&H;) *List of Irish Times winners *UCC Philosoph wiki database of debaters Category:1951 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Irish judges Category:People from Dublin
title: Adrian Hardiman
